name: Juliet
description: Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel that uplifts both mind and body with a sweet berry aroma. A subtle buzz of cerebral energy promotes focus and sharpens the senses in a comfortable psychoactive experience conducive to social activities. Juliet’s happy calm may be useful for patients treating mood and stress disorders like anxiety and depression.
descriptionPlain: Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel that uplifts both mind and body with a sweet berry aroma. A subtle buzz of cerebral energy promotes focus and sharpens the senses in a comfortable psychoactive experience conducive to social activities. Juliet’s happy calm may be useful for patients treating mood and stress disorders like anxiety and depression.

highlightedReviews.text: probably in my top 3 of all time..very smooth flavor and draw from the bong with no coughing.. i agree with the other reviewer - this is a very different strain from what you might be accustomed to smoking. And that's a good thing-not bad.  For me Juliet makes me feel extremely happy and focused. Seems to be great for social situations because you don't get that paranoia creep that some other sativa dominants provide. Just a feeling of bliss and euphoria. Would like to smoke a bowl of this on Saturday morning with a strong coffee and  followed by a bowl of Blue Dream, which for me provides a "get shit done" mindset and helps me knock out my honey do list..

This is my new favorite strain. It’s the perfect hybrid. If you smoke a lot of it and just want to be completely lazy, this is good for couch melting. If you want to be energized, focused, and productive, it’s perfect for that as well. The high I received from this is very controlled, depending on how I want to feel at the time. This helps with pain relief and makes me feel happy. Only cons for me is I get a headache afterwards and dry mouth.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Enigma, Juliet, White Fire Alien OG, Double Dream, and Earth OG
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Say hello to the five new strains added to the Leafly database! Our new indica Enigma is a potent remedy for patients treating appetite loss or sleeplessness, and relief arrives quickly with relaxing euphoria. Popular in Colorado, Juliet is a sativa-dominant hybrid that delivers a subtle jolt of cerebral energy suitable for focus, creativity, and social outings. You can’t go wrong with Double Dream if you’re looking for something reminiscent of Blue Dream, and you’ll recognize a few other familiar strains in the 60% indica White Fire Alien OG. Last but not least, Earth OG unites Sour Diesel and Ghost OG in an uplifting, happy hybrid that helps fend off depression, anxiety, and other mood disorders.
These strains aren’t complete without your reviews, so if you’ve chanced upon any of these in your cannabis journeys, let’s hear your opinion!
1. Enigma
Characteristics of Enigma:

Indica-dominant strain
Earthy and tangy aroma
Brings long-lasting effects such as euphoria, happiness, and sleepiness
Good for treating appetite loss and/or cachexia

2. Juliet
Characteristics of Juliet:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cinderella 99 and NYC Diesel
Sweet berry aroma
Delivers a buzz of cerebral energy that promotes focus and sharpens the senses
May help with mood and stress disorders

3. White Fire Alien OG
Characteristics of White Fire Alien OG:

60% indica
Breeder: OG Raskal
Sweet lemon aroma
Cross between The White and Fire Alien Kush
Brings full-body relaxation and stress relief
Helps ease pain, anxiety, and tension

4. Double Dream
Characteristics of Double Dream:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Dream and Dream Star
Sweet floral, berry and spice aroma
Delivers a dreamy, euphoric buzz anchored by a deep, physical relaxation 
May help treat pain, anxiety, stress, inflammation, PTSD, headaches, and nausea

5. Earth OG
Characteristics of Earth OG:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Sour Diesel and Ghost OG
Earthy and sour lemon aroma
Can deliver creative, energetic, and talkative effects
Good for depression, stress, anxiety, appetite loss, and nausea
